update goods
sgoodsname = #{sgoodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sgoodstype = #{sgoodstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sgoodsweight = #{sgoodsweight,jdbcType=REAL},
sgoodsacreage = #{sgoodsacreage,jdbcType=REAL},
sgoodsstate = #{sgoodsstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sgoodsregion = #{sgoodsregion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sgoodstime = #{sgoodstime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
eid = #{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update goods set sgoodsname = #{sgoodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sgoodstype = #{sgoodstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sgoodsweight = #{sgoodsweight,jdbcType=REAL}, sgoodsacreage = #{sgoodsacreage,jdbcType=REAL}, sgoodsstate = #{sgoodsstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sgoodsregion = #{sgoodsregion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sgoodstime = #{sgoodstime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, eid = #{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
